name: Replacement of missing teeth
description: Ental implants are one of the most common methods of tooth replacement.Dental implants are a very reliable type of tooth replacement that both looks and feels like a real tooth.

name: Orthodontic Treatment
description: Orthodontic treatment is a way of straightening or moving teeth, to improve the appearance of the teeth and how they work. It can also help to look after the long-term health of your teeth.

name: Single Sitting Root Canal Treatment
description: When there is an acute infection with no pus accumalation in & around the tooth, Root canal treatment can be completed in a single sitting. The biggest diagnostic aid in this case is an X-ray.
